programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two hard-partying brothers (Zac Efron, Adam Devine) bring two wild and uncontrollable women to their sister's (Sugar Lyn Beard) wedding in Hawaii.

programme.title: Veronica Mars, (2014, Mystery)
programme.desc: On the eve of her law-school graduation, Veronica turns amateur sleuth once again after ex-boyfriend, Logan, becomes a murder suspect.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: London publicist Edina Monsoon and best friend Patsy Stone flee to the French Riviera after accidentally knocking supermodel Kate Moss into the River Thames.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: Villeneuve Pironi: Racing's Untold Tragedy, (2022, Documentary)
programme.desc: The story of Canadian Formula 1 legend Gilles Villeneuve and French star Didier Pironi, two fearless Ferrari Formula 1 drivers, forever torn apart by a historic and hugely controversial moment in time.

programme.title: The Assistant, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Digital assistants are programmed to help people. However, when one such bot goes rogue, it ends up becoming a nightmare for its owner, who is stepping into new beginnings.

programme.title: The Farewell, (2019, Comedy)
programme.desc: Billi's family returns to China under the guise of a fake wedding to stealthily say goodbye to their beloved matriarch -- the only person that doesn't know she only has a few weeks to live.

programme.title: It Follows, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: Following a strange sexual encounter, a teenager (Maika Monroe) has disturbing visions and the inescapable feeling that someone -- or something -- is stalking her.

programme.title: Keeping Up With the Joneses, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: An ordinary suburban couple (Zach Galifianakis, Isla Fisher) discover it's not easy keeping up with their gorgeous and ultra-sophisticated new neighbors, the Joneses, especially when they discover that Mr. and Mrs. Jones are really covert operatives.

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Former Police Sergeant Barnes becomes head of security for Senator Charlie Roan, a Presidential candidate targeted for death on Purge night due to her vow to eliminate the Purge.

programme.title: Dream Scenario, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: A family man finds his life turned upside down when millions of strangers suddenly start seeing him in their dreams. However, when his nighttime appearances take a nightmarish turn, he's forced to navigate the consequences of his newfound stardom.

programme.title: Anthropoid, (2016, History)
programme.desc: In December 1941, two Czech soldiers (Cillian Murphy, Jamie Dornan) parachute into their occupied homeland to assassinate Nazi officer Reinhard Heydrich (Detlef Bothe).

programme.title: Batman: The Killing Joke, (2016, Animated)
programme.desc: Batman (Kevin Conroy) must save Commissioner Gordon (Ray Wise) from the Joker's (Mark Hamill) twisted quest to drive him insane.

programme.title: Role Models, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Forced to join a mentorship program, two irresponsible men (Seann William Scott, Paul Rudd) must help a pair of impressionable boys navigate the troubled waters of youth.

programme.title: Teen Spirit, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: A shy teenager dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition.

programme.title: Blood Father, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: An ex-convict (Mel Gibson) and his estranged daughter (Erin Moriarty) go on the run from her drug-dealing boyfriend (Diego Luna) and his vicious cartel.

programme.title: Low Tide, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: When teenager Alan and his younger brother find a bag of gold coins in a dead man's island home, they try to hide it from their friends -- but one of them, suspicious and violently unpredictable, is willing to do anything to get the money.

programme.title: Almost Christmas, (2016, Christmas)
programme.desc: A beloved patriarch asks his family members for one gift this holiday season: to get along. If they can honor that wish and spend five days under the same roof without killing one another, it will be a Christmas miracle.

programme.title: Balls Out, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fifth year college senior Caleb Fuller (Jake Lacy) gets his flag football team back together for one last shot at intramural football glory.

programme.title: Gloria Bell, (2018, Romance)
programme.desc: A free-spirited divorcee spends her nights on the dance floor, joyfully letting loose at clubs around Los Angeles. She soon finds herself thrust into an unexpected new romance, filled with the joys of budding love and the complications of dating.

programme.title: Pure, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: An insecure girl grapples with fears of embracing her sexuality.

programme.title: Sergio Leone: The Italian Who Invented America, (2022, Documentary)
programme.desc: An homage to Italian film director Sergio Leone, credited as the pioneer of the spaghetti western subgenre, featuring interviews with Quentin Tarantino, Robert De Niro and Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: A fatherless teen starts to insinuate himself into the life of a renowned surgeon, his wife and two children. The full scope of his intent soon becomes menacingly clear when he confronts the doctor with a long-forgotten transgression.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan, (2016, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan (Alexander Skarsgrd) must return to the jungle to save his captive wife (Margot Robbie) from King Leopold's devious envoy (Christoph Waltz).

programme.title: 3 From Hell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Crazed killers Baby Firefly, Captain Spaulding and Otis Driftwood unleash bloody mayhem after escaping from prison.

programme.title: It Comes at Night, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families are forced to share a home in an uneasy alliance to keep the outside evil at bay -- only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: The Lovers, (2017, Romance)
programme.desc: A man and his wife, each embroiled in an extramarital affair, are sent reeling when they suddenly fall for the least likely person imaginable -- each other.

programme.title: The Ballad of Lefty Brown, (2017, Western)
programme.desc: A merciless cowboy sets out on a dangerous journey across the frontier, determined to do whatever it takes to avenge his longtime partner's brutal murder.

programme.title: Taking Woodstock, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: Elliot Tiber plays a pivotal role in the generation-defining concert by helping to secure Max Yasgur's farm as a venue and offering his parents' motel as a base for organizers.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla, (1974, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An Okinawan monster-god helps Godzilla defeat his bionic double.

programme.title: Traitor, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Conflicting evidence leads a federal agent (Guy Pearce) to question the motives behind a former Special Ops soldier's (Don Cheadle) apparent ties to terrorist groups.

programme.title: Dim Sum Funeral, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: The grown children of an overbearing Chinese matriarch reluctantly gather to take part in seven days' worth of traditional funeral rites.

programme.title: Notting Hill, (1999, Romance)
programme.desc: A man's (Hugh Grant) life changes when an international star (Julia Roberts) walks into his bookshop.

programme.title: He's Just Not That Into You, (2009, Romance)
programme.desc: Friends and lovers try to navigate their way through the complexities of modern relationships, sometimes misconstruing the true intentions of the opposite sex.

programme.title: Tuesday, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: A mother and her daughter must confront Death when it arrives in the form of an astonishing talking bird.

programme.title: Fantastic Planet, (1973, Animated)
programme.desc: The 39-foot-tall pastel Draags keep leashes on the Oms, their tiny pets descended from humans.

programme.title: Priscilla, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: When teenage Priscilla Beaulieu meets Elvis Presley at a party, the man who is already a meteoric rock 'n' roll superstar becomes someone entirely unexpected in private moments: a thrilling crush, an ally in loneliness, a vulnerable best friend.

programme.title: Prisoners, (2013, Thriller)
programme.desc: When police have to release their only suspect, a desperate man (Hugh Jackman) takes the law into his own hands after his young daughter and her friend disappear.

programme.title: Hackers, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: A master hacker (Jonny Lee Miller) unites teen computer freaks against an embezzling computer-security agent known as the Plague.

programme.title: For All Mankind, (1989, Documentary)
programme.desc: A unique view of the moon is made possible through film taken by the Apollo astronauts who landed on the surface.

programme.title: Love Happens, (2009, Romance)
programme.desc: The possibility of a new romance leads a self-help guru (Aaron Eckhart) to the realization that he has never truly confronted his wife's death.

programme.title: Edge of Darkness, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: After his daughter is shot on his doorstep, a Boston detective (Mel Gibson) learns about her secret life and a far-reaching coverup linked to her death.

programme.title: We Are Your Friends, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: An aspiring disc jockey (Zac Efron) befriends a veteran DJ (Wes Bentley) who shows him the ropes, but jeopardizes it all when he falls for the man's young girlfriend (Emily Ratajkowski).

programme.title: Drag Me to Hell, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: After actions trigger the loss of an old woman's home, an ambitious loan officer finds herself the victim of a curse that will damn her soul for eternity.

programme.title: Logan, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: In the near future, a weary Logan (Hugh Jackman) cares for an ailing Professor X (Patrick Stewart) while protecting a young mutant girl (Dafne Keen) from the dark forces that want to capture her.

programme.title: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk With Me, (1992, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Agent Cooper (Kyle MacLachlan) comes to Twin Peaks, Wash., following two unresolved murders and the disappearance of two fellow agents.

programme.title: Night on Earth, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: Five brief encounters occur in five taxis on the same night in Los Angeles, New York, Rome, Paris and Helsinki.

programme.title: Godzilla Raids Again, (1955, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Prehistoric monsters Godzilla and Anguirus battle it out in Osaka, Japan.

programme.title: Candyman: Farewell to the Flesh, (1995, Horror)
programme.desc: The daughter (Kelly Rowan) of a New Orleans aristocrat ties his murder to the legend of an artist (Tony Todd) fitted with a hook.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: Unstoppable, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: When an unmanned locomotive roars out of control, two railroad employees (Denzel Washington, Chris Pine) must find a way to bring it to a halt before it crashes and spills its toxic cargo.

programme.title: The Martian, (2015, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Left behind by his crew, a stranded astronaut must find a way to survive on Mars, while NASA and a team of international scientists work tirelessly to bring him home.

programme.title: High Life, (2018, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Monte and his baby daughter are the last survivors of a damned and dangerous mission to the outer reaches of the solar system. They must now rely on each other to survive as they hurtle toward the oblivion of a black hole.

programme.title: Save Yourselves!, (2020, Comedy)
programme.desc: A young Brooklyn couple head to an upstate cabin to unplug from their phones and reconnect with each other. Blissfully unaware of their surroundings, they are left to their own devices as the planet falls under attack.

programme.title: Out of the Furnace, (2013, Thriller)
programme.desc: A steelworker (Christian Bale) takes matters into his own hands when his brother (Casey Affleck) joins one of the Northeast's most-ruthless crime syndicates, then disappears.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: An outlaw (Henry Fonda) working for a railroad magnate fights a stranger (Charles Bronson) for a New Orleans widow's (Claudia Cardinale) land.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge: Going for the Gold, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Two ice skaters (Christy Carlson Romano, Ross Thomas) develop a love-hate relationship while dreaming of Olympic glory.

programme.title: Summer Days, Summer Nights, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: On the south shore of Long Island in the summer of 1983, a group of working-class teenagers and 20-somethings work their summer jobs, fall in and out of love, and wrestle with what the future holds when the summer ends and the real world beckons.

programme.title: She's Out of My League, (2010, Romance)
programme.desc: An airport security agent must figure out how to make the relationship work when a beautiful, successful woman falls in love with him.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles, (1987, Thanksgiving)
programme.desc: An ad exec (Steve Martin) and a shower-curtain-ring salesman (John Candy) become co-travelers on the way to Thanksgiving in Chicago.

programme.title: Landscape With Invisible Hand, (2023, Adventure)
programme.desc: Two teens hatch a risky plan to save their families when an occupying alien species leaves most of the planet impoverished and unemployed.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem, (2023, Animated)
programme.desc: The Turtle brothers take on a mysterious crime syndicate, but they soon get in over their heads when an army of mutants is unleashed upon them.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Following a night of drinking in a ski-resort hot tub, four pals awake in 1986, getting a chance to rewrite the past.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: As Luke's tests intensify, a new arrival causes problems for Sigsby; Tim isn't buying the official story about what happened to Annie.

programme.title: The Mask of Zorro, (1998, Adventure)
programme.desc: The fabled avenger (Anthony Hopkins) trains an uncouth protege (Antonio Banderas) to drive a Spanish tyrant out of California once and for all.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything they've faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: IF, (2024, Family)
programme.desc: After discovering she can see everyone's imaginary friends, a girl embarks on a magical adventure to reconnect forgotten IFs with their kids.

programme.title: How It Ends, (2021, Comedy)
programme.desc: A woman scores an invite to one last wild party before the world ends. However, making it there won't be easy after her car is stolen and the clock is ticking on her plan to tie up loose ends with friends and family.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: As Luke's tests intensify, a new arrival causes problems for Sigsby; Tim isn't buying the official story about what happened to Annie.

programme.title: The Passenger, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: Randy is perfectly content to fade into the background, but when one of his co-workers goes on a sudden and violent rampage, he must face his fears and confront his troubled past to survive.

programme.title: 1900, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: The son (Robert De Niro) of a landowner and the son (Grard Depardieu) of a peasant become enemies in 20th-century Italy.

programme.title: Here After, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Claire is overjoyed when her daughter, Robin, is miraculously revived after a fatal accident. However, her relief soon turns to dread as she starts to suspect that something dark has followed Robin back from the brink of death.

programme.title: Dark Harvest, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: Teens confront a legendary supernatural specter that emerges from the cornfields of a small Midwestern town every fall.

programme.title: Jacob's Ladder, (1990, Horror)
programme.desc: A Vietnam vet prone to flashbacks walks the edge of sanity as he searches for the cause of his nightmarish visions.

programme.title: Spell, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: After surviving a plane crash in rural Appalachia, a man tries to break free from a woman's dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual before the rise of the blood moon.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Supernatural events plague a college professor (Harrison Ford) and his wife (Michelle Pfeiffer) as they investigate a murder she believes occurred next door.

programme.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: A killer stalks North Carolina teens (Jennifer Love Hewitt, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Ryan Phillippe) who disposed of an auto accident's live victim.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: Desperado brothers (George Clooney, Quentin Tarantino) kidnap a preacher (Harvey Keitel) and his kids, commandeer their RV and wind up in a Mexican strip joint where vampires lurk.

programme.title: Pet Sematary: Bloodlines, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: In 1969, a young Jud Crandall dreams of leaving his hometown of Ludlow, Maine, behind but soon discovers sinister secrets buried within and is forced to confront a dark family history that will forever keep him connected to Ludlow.

programme.title: Event Horizon, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A spaceship missing for seven years finally re-emerges and sends out a distress signal. But when a team is sent out to investigate, they discover that something sinister has taken over the craft.

programme.title: Death Wish, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Dr. Paul Kersey is an experienced trauma surgeon, a man who has spent his life saving lives. After an attack on his family, Paul embarks on his own mission for justice.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: Luke begins to plan his escape while Sigsby is distracted trying to expose Stackhouse's disloyalty; Tim loses a friend.

programme.title: The Institute
programme.desc: As Luke's tests intensify, a new arrival causes problems for Sigsby; Tim isn't buying the official story about what happened to Annie.

programme.title: Unseen, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: Sam, a gas station clerk, receives a random call from Emily, a nearly blind woman who's running from her murderous ex in the woods. Using a phone, Sam becomes Emily's only chance for survival as she guides the terrified woman through a video call.

programme.title: The Wolf of Snow Hollow, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: A stressed-out police officer struggles not to give in to the paranoia that grips his small mountain town as bodies turn up after each full moon.

programme.title: Child's Play, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: Two teachers (James Mason, Robert Preston) breed violence at a boys boarding school, with a gym teacher (Beau Bridges) in the middle.

programme.title: Snack Shack, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Best friends AJ and Moose seize the opportunity to run the local pool's rundown snack shack. However, things take an unexpected turn when they meet Brooke, an effortlessly cool lifeguard who puts their big summer plans -- and friendship -- at risk.

programme.title: Landscape With Invisible Hand, (2023, Adventure)
programme.desc: Two teens hatch a risky plan to save their families when an occupying alien species leaves most of the planet impoverished and unemployed.

programme.title: Team America: World Police, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Puppet commandos protect the planet from fiendish terrorists and North Korean dictator Kim Jong Il (Trey Parker).

programme.title: Be Cool, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: Chili Palmer (John Travolta) runs afoul of music-industry players when he teams up with a friend's widow (Uma Thurman) to produce a singer's debut album.

programme.title: Dog, (2022, Comedy)
programme.desc: With a dog named Lulu by his side, Army Ranger Briggs races down the Pacific Coast to make it to a soldier's funeral on time. Along the way, Briggs and Lulu drive each other completely crazy, break a handful of laws and narrowly evade death.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks.

programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: A blundering Los Angeles detective (Leslie Nielsen) and his boss (George Kennedy) foil a plan to assassinate Queen Elizabeth.

programme.title: The Naked Gun 2 1/2: The Smell of Fear, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: Frank (Leslie Nielsen) and Ed (George Kennedy) of "Police Squad" blunder through another case, an energy-related plot in Washington, D.C.

programme.title: The Institute

programme.title: Uma Noiva em Apuros, (2018, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Karina est fazendo o possvel para ter o primeiro relacionamento feliz em sua vida. Infelizmente, o homem a quem ela deu seu corao parece estar mais interessado em si mesmo do que nela.

programme.title: Como Encontrar Algum Para Sempre, (2022, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Ela uma excelente cerimonialista de festas de noivado, mas sua vida amorosa um desastre. Enquanto ela planeja o evento mais importante, o homem que pode arruinar tudo talvez seja o mesmo que a ajudar a encontrar a sua prpria felicidade.

programme.title: Crise da Meia Idade, (2022, Comedy)
programme.desc: Nesta divertida comdia, Pete um terapeuta sexual bem-sucedido quando descobre, aos 30 anos, que nunca atingiu a puberdade. Agora, ele ter que navegar pelas dores e alegrias da adolescncia questionando todo seu conhecimento sobre a sexualidade.

programme.title: Senhora Presidente, (2022, Comedy)
programme.desc: Aps um ano no cargo, a presidente est exausta e decide sair uma noite disfarada, para evitar chamar a ateno do pblico. Ela inicia um romance inesperado com um homem que no faz ideia de quem ela realmente .

programme.title: O Primeiro Amor de um Homem, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Nada como a morte para dar vida ao romance: a sorte de um azarado jovem muda quando ele precisa carregar o caixo de algum que no conhece. Com David Schwimmer e Gwyneth Paltrow.

programme.title: Um Romance na Alta Moda, (2015, Romance)
programme.desc: Kate sonha em ser design de moda. Apesar de ser brilhante e talentosa, ningum deseja contrat-la, pois difcil confiar nela j que seu pai LeeKassell, uma varejista de roupas que so inspiradas nos designers para quem Kate deseja trabalhar.

programme.title: Quase casados, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: Depois de perceber que ela perseguia um relacionamento romntico com o cara errado quando estava no ensino mdio, uma jovem retorna sua pequena cidade para encontrar sua antiga paixo e declarar suas intenes romnticas para ele.

programme.title: Pronta para Amar, (2020, Comedy)
programme.desc: Marley Corbett uma jovem divertida com medo de se entregar completamente a um relacionamento. Ela tenta usar o humor para impedir que os problemas se agravem, mas pega de surpresa quando descobre que est com uma doena grave.

programme.title: No Sei Como Ela Consegue, (2011, Comedy)
programme.desc: Uma comdia centrada na vida de Kate Reddy, uma executiva financeira que a ganha-po do seu marido e dos seus dois filhos.

programme.desc: Jack Wells se junta a um grupo de arquelogos para explorar uma tumba recm-descoberta no Egito, a do Rei Maldito. L ele ter a experincia mais aterrorizante de sua vida.

programme.desc: O hacker Connor, seu melhor amigo Avi e Gwen, uma bibliotecria astuta, deparam-se com algo muito acima de sua capacidade quando so forados a competir em um sofisticado jogo de recrutamento global de uma sociedade secreta da dark web.

programme.title: Minha Morte, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: De frias em uma ilha na Tailndia, o casal Neil e Christine acordam de ressaca e sem nenhuma lembrana da noite anterior. Eles encontram a filmagem da cmera de Neil e assistem como ele parece assassinar Christine. Juntos, tentam desvendar o caso.

programme.title: Thor - Caada ao Ladro, (2010, Adventure)
programme.desc: Tom treinou o pastor alemo Thor e aprendeu muitas habilidades.Com sua namorada Mirjam, eles tm aventuras emocionantes.Nas frias, a diverso vira enrascada quando a famlia confundida com bandidos e precisa provar sua inocncia.

programme.title: Shin-Ultraman, (2022, Adventure)
programme.desc: A Terra est sob ataque. Invasores aliengenas, conhecidos como Espcie Classe S, devastam o planeta. A humanidade, em sua luta desesperada pela sobrevivncia, deposita sua esperana em um gigante guerreiro vindo do espao.

programme.title: Um Garoto no Palcio de Aladim, (1998, Children)
programme.desc: Calvin, um jovem entregador de pizza, confundido com o "Grande Libertador" por um gnio, que o atrai de volta ao sculo VIII, onde deve unir foras com Ali Bab para salvar toda a Arbia do irmo maligno de Aladim, Luxor.

programme.title: Os Meninos Voadores, (2008, Children)
programme.desc: Dois meninos de uma pequena cidade testam sua coragem quando acidentalmente escapam a bordo de um avio pertencente mfia.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notrio criminoso chins.

programme.title: Mee-Shee: O Gigante das Aguas, (2007, Children)
programme.desc: Aviagem para Disney foi cancelada.Mac e seu pai, Sean, vo a uma cidade com um lago.Eles encontraro aventuras emocionantes que superam a Disney, com perseguies e bandidos.Uma histria de amizade para toda a famlia.

programme.title: Trenk - O Cavaleiro Trapalho, (2015, Children)
programme.desc: Trenk, de dez anos, campons e propriedade do malvado Sir Wertolt, quer se tornar um cavaleiro e libertar sua famlia. Depois de muitas aventuras, ele resolve o problema do drago do ducado e nomeado cavaleiro pelo duque.

programme.title: A jornada mgica de Emily, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Depois da morte de seu pai, a pequena Emily tenta ajudar sua me a reencontrar a felicidade e aprender sobre o pai que nunca conheceu.

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin: Cavaleiros de Camelot, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Um Rei Arthur muito mais velho retorna para casa aps lutar contra o Imprio Romano. Seu filho ilegtimo corrompeu o trono de Camelot. Agora o Rei Arthur deve se reunir com o mago Merlin e os Cavaleiros da Tvola Redonda e lutar para recuperar sua coroa.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Vale da Luta, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Depois que a jovem Tori encontrada morta, sua irm Windsor inicia uma investigao por conta prpria e descobre que ela lutava para pagar suas despesas.

programme.title: Metendo os Ps Pelas Mos, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Danny McBride estrela esta comdia como Fred Simmons, um mestre de Tae Kwon Do incompetente, egosta e agressivo que coordena seu dojo com mo de ferro.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vtima de suas armadilhas o inspetor de polcia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que so brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: A Espada do Imortal, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Manji um samurai altamente qualificado que torna-se amaldioado com a imortalidade aps uma lendria batalha. Ele decide ajudar uma jovem que est movida pelo dio e pela sede de vingana.

programme.title: Perseguio Explosiva, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Um dubl se envolve acidentalmente em crimes envolvendo relquias misteriosas e agora precisa lutar para sobreviver ao longo de uma srie de aventuras perigosas e incrveis.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresrio em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Co de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma mquina de matar, (Jet Li) campeo de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingana do drago, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendrio lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmo de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingana.

programme.title: The Hound Of The Baskervilles, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: A hellish hound feeds upon the flesh of the heirs of Baskerville Hall. But before this beast can sink its teeth into the newest lord, it must pit its vicious fangs against the searing intellect of Sherlock Holmes (Peter Cushing) and Dr. Watson.

programme.title: Stalag 17, (1953, War)
programme.desc: Laced with comedy and cynicism, this is the story of a group of GIs who are thrown together in the notorious German prison camp Stalag 17, their suspicions about one being a spy and their efforts to escape.

programme.title: Some Like It Hot, (1959, Comedy)
programme.desc: This hysterical comedy from director Billy Wilder finds Tony Curtis and Jack Lemmon masquerading as women in order to elude irate Chicago mobsters while befriending a beautiful singer (Marilyn Monroe).

programme.title: The Seven Year Itch, (1955, Comedy)
programme.desc: With his family away for their annual summer holiday, New Yorker Richard Sherman (Tom Ewell) decides he has the opportunity to live a bachelor's life. The beautiful but ditsy blond (Marilyn Monroe) from the apartment above his catches his eye.

programme.title: His Girl Friday, (1939, Comedy)
programme.desc: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

programme.title: Father Goose, (1964, Comedy)

programme.title: To Catch a Thief, (1955, Thriller)

May grew up as a lonely oddball whose only friend was a perfectly kept doll. When she moves to L.A., she takes up with a handsome filmmaker and then an alluring lesbian, but every connection she makes turns out deadly.

programme.desc: A mild-mannered CIA researcher, paid to read books, returns from lunch to find all of his co-workers assassinated. "Condor" must find out who did this and get in from the cold before the hitmen get him.

programme.title: Walking Tall, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: City 'Scape
programme.desc: As Zuzu and Yugo try to unravel the riddle of Yuya's dimensional doubles, their sleuthing is cut short by Sector Security!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Tops Speed
programme.desc: Zuzu and Yugo redline their Duel Runner in a high-stakes Turbo Duel with Sector Security! Can they outrun the long arm of the law, or will Security put the brakes on their escape?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Synchro Sector
programme.desc: When Yuya and his pals arrive in the Synchro Dimension, Sector Security is waiting for them with open arms and cuffs! Can Yuya smooth things out before Sylvio and Celina put a wrinkle in his plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Super Duelists
programme.desc: Its a superheroic showdown in the Synchro Dimension pitting Super Gong against his arch-nemesis, Dennis the Destroyer!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Scream for the Green
programme.desc: Dennis and Gong are in for the ride of their lives when theyre introduced to the turbo-charged world of underground motorcycle dueling!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Duelings Most Wanted
programme.desc: The battle between Dashin Dennis and Sweet Baby Shay hits a speedbump when Sector Security pulls the plug on their Turbo Duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Showdown in the Slammer
programme.desc: Yuya learns the ins and outs of The Facility the hard way by coming face-to-face with the toughest and most dangerous duelist in the cell block: the Kingpin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Heros Fall
programme.desc: With his deck on the line, Yuya looks to rock the cell block and KO the Kingpin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Yuya is determined to do the impossible and escape from The Facility, but when friends become foes his plan to break out, breaks down!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Fight for Freedom
programme.desc: When Yuya and his pals try to flee The Facility, their big breakout takes a terrible turn when their escape route leads them straight into the security guards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Match with the Master
programme.desc: The opening ceremonies of the Friendship Cup kick into overdrive as Yuya squares off against the Master of Faster - Jack Atlas!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Traits of a Traitor
programme.desc: With the Friendship Cup about to kick off, Yuya learns about tournament champion Jacks rise to the Tops!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Crows Crew
programme.desc: The first duel of the Friendship Cup has the green light as Crow and Gong put the pedal to the metal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Rileys Reveal
programme.desc: Rileys been chosen to Turbo Duel Shinji, but the battle hits a speedbump when Yuya steps in to stop the duel and keep his pint-sized pal in one piece!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Common Cause
programme.desc: For Shinji to inspire the Commons to stand up to the Topsiders, he must first take down Moon Shadow! Can Shinjis monsters swarm together and deliver the sting of defeat, or will Moon Shadows ninjas silence all the buzz?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: A Concerted Effort
programme.desc: Yuyas friends are forced to face off in a duel where the loser is banished forever! No matter who wins, Yuya loses!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: The Gift of Grit
programme.desc: As the Friendship Cup picks up the pace, Jack Atlas takes a timeout to reveal the secrets of his past!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Duel Consequences
programme.desc: Officer 227 is in hot pursuit to take Yuya down - all the way down to the underground! Can Yuya outrun the long arm of the law, or does 227 have his number?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Turbotainers
programme.desc: Sylvio finally takes center stage at the Friendship Cup, but will he crash and burn under the spotlight?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Turning Point
programme.desc: An escapee from the underground brings word to Yuya on how to take control of the Friendship Cup!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: A Traitor Unmasked
programme.desc: Shays duel with Dennis turns into a battle of wits when he tries to force Dennis to reveal his dark secret.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Shays Revenge
programme.desc: After finding out that Dennis is from the Fusion Dimension, Shay sets his sights on getting revenge!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Plans of Attack
programme.desc: Yuya and Roget reflect on their pasts to make plans for the future!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: A Con's Game
programme.desc: Zuzu goes deck-to-deck against Sergey an ex-con whos looking to X out the competition!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Rebel Road
programme.desc: Zuzus been hurt, but Yuya cant race to her rescue until he defeats Shinji first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Road to Rebellion
programme.desc: Shinjis Battlewasps are stinging Yuya to submission! But does Yuya have one last card that will tip the scales in his favor?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Where the Truth Lies
programme.desc: Yuyas newest ally is Roget? Questions are raised that plunge Yuya's reputation into a freefall!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Battle Birds
programme.desc: Crow and Shay soar down the track in a high-flying battle where the loser will crash land into the underground!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Warriors of the Air
programme.desc: Shay and Crow's winged warriors fight, claw and flap towards the finaleuntil an unexpected guest decides to join their duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: A Matter of Trust
programme.desc: Zuzus on the run from Sector Security, but can a little help from some little friends help her avoid big trouble?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: A Plan and a Promise: Part 1
programme.desc: The Friendship Cup heats up as Yugo and Celina tear through the tricky twists and turns of a transforming duel track!
programme.sub-title: A Plan and a Promise: Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: A Plan and a Promise: Part 2
programme.desc: Yugos in for a bumpy ride as hes forced to zigzag his way across a duel track thats been mapped for mayhem by Roget!
programme.sub-title: A Plan and a Promise: Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Against All Odds
programme.desc: Furious over Celina's failure at the Friendship Cup, Roget sends a squad of Sector Security to seize her.

programme.title: Luffy and his crew search for a way out of Apes Concert, but the Rainbow Mist is an inescapable maze of madness. Back on shore, Nami, Chopper, and Sanji face a lifetime of hard labor for failing to pay their taxes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Thoughts of Home! The Pirate Graveyard of No Escape!

programme.title: Nami enters the mist on a mission to save her mates and maybe hunt for treasure while shes at it. The local mayor wants her dead, but the Straw Hats are being protected by a mysterious marine.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Inevitable Melee! Wetton's Schemes and the Rainbow Tower

programme.title: The showdown with Mayor Wetton builds towards an explosive finale as the Straw Hats scramble to escape the Rainbow Mist or be trapped inside forever.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: And So, the Legend Begins! To the Other Side of the Rainbow

programme.title: The Straw Hats are nearly crushed by the falling wreckage of a ship thats over 200 years old. Could rumors of a floating island in the sky be true? Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji go scuba diving to find out!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Caught log! The king of salvagers, Masira!

programme.title: Still searching for a route to the island in the sky, the Straw Hats chart a course for Jaya. Meanwhile, Fire-Fist Ace crashes a party aboard a vessel helmed by Buggy the Pirate!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Monsters Appear! Don't Mess with The White Beard Pirates!

programme.title: The Straw Hats drop anchor at a town overrun by scallywags, so Nami makes the boys swear to stay out of trouble. But when the Bellamy Pirates come looking for a fight, Luffy may have to break his promise!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Quit Dreaming! Mock Town, The Town Of Ridicule!

programme.title: Nicos handy work unearths a solitary dreamer who may know the way to Sky Island. All Luffy and his crew have to do is survive the sonic onslaught of simian salvagers seeking to sink the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Distinguished Pirates! A Man Who Talks Of Dreams And The King Of Undersea Search!

programme.title: Luffy and his mates reach the home of Mont Blanc Cricket: the man with the key to reaching Sky Island. Theres just one tiny problem he comes from a long line of legendary liars.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Montblanc Cricket agrees to help the Straw Hats reach Sky Island, but first they must venture deep into the darkest depths of a spider-infested forest to capture a mysterious bird with a keen sense of direction.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Steer for the Clouds! Capture the South bird!!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats battle creepy-crawly forest creatures on their quest to capture a South Bird, Mont Blanc and his monkey minions are brutally attacked by the Bellamy Pirates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dreams Don't Come True?! Bellamy Versus the Saruyama Alliance!

programme.title: Luffy turned the other cheek during his first encounter with Bellamy, but now hes out to settle the score for old man Mont Blanc. Meanwhile, a fearsome pirate crew takes aim at the Straw Hats, eager to earn a bad reputation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: 100 Million Man! World's Greatest Power and Pirate Black Beard!

programme.title: Thanks to some modifications to the Going Merry, the Straw Hats are on their way to that island in the sky! But with the Blackbeard Pirates in hot pursuit, navigating the vertical currents will be anything but easy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Take to the Sky! Ride the Knockup Stream!

programme.title: Reaching the sea of clouds proves easier than surviving in it when giant sea creatures attack the Going Merry, Usopp nearly drowns in a cloud, and a strange sky knight issues the Straw Hats a warning!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sail the white sea! The sky knight and the gate in the clouds!

programme.title: After hitching a ride on a speedy shrimp, the Straw Hats reach the land of Skypiea! The intrepid pirates have much to learn about their new surroundings, but a beautiful angel makes a perfect tour guide.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Godland, skypiea! Angels on a beach of clouds!

programme.title: Namis eagerness to explore the forbidden realm of Upper Yard brings her face to face with the wrath of god, and the Straw Hats incur Heavens Judgment for failing to pay their immigration fees!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The forbidden sacred ground! The island where god lives and heaven's judgement!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are no strangers to living on the wrong side of the law, but unpaid immigration fees and Namis assault of a White Beret earns Luffys crew a sentence of death by cloud drifting!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Already criminals?! Skypiea's upholder of the law!

programme.title: Nami, Zoro, Chopper, and Robin are trapped aboard the Going Merry when its commandeered by a monstrous lobster! To rescue his crew, Luffy must venture onto the sacred grounds of Upper Yard!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Is escape possible?! God's challenge is set in motion!

programme.title: Conis helps Luffy and his mates launch their rescue mission, but the rubber-man senses something amiss. When he presses her for answers, a vengeful god takes a shot at the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A trap on lovely street! The almighty eneru!

programme.title: Zoro dukes it out with a hungry Skyshark in the shadow of the Sacrificial Alter. On the other side of Upper Yard, Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp try to survive their visit to an island that wants them dead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Onward, crow! To the sacrifical altar!

programme.title: Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp tangle with Satori and his exploding, snake-filled Surprise Clouds. The sky priest may look like a dancing dango, but the impact of his mantra leaves the pirates bloodied and boatless.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: 10% survival rate! Satori, the mantra master!

programme.title: Usopp and Sanji try to regain control of the Crow, and Luffy stirs up a brutal barrage of bursting balls when he attacks Satori. Meanwhile, Chopper whistles for the Sky Knight to avoid becoming a sacrificial reindeer!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ordeal of spheres! Desperate struggle in the lost forest!

programme.title: Chopper fights bravely to stop Shura from incinerating the Going Merry, but the little reindeer is no match for a sky priest. Gan Fall is on his way, but will the dispossessed deity arrive in time?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chopper in danger! Former god vs. Priest shura!

programme.title: When Gan Fall is badly burned during his battle with Shura, Chopper musters the courage for a death-defying leap of faith. Elsewhere, Luffy may have finally discovered a way to defeat Satori!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Profound mystery! Ordeal of string and ordeal of love?!

programme.title: The Shandorians prepare for an all-out attack on their priestly adversaries, Chopper meets the mysterious creatures that saved his life, and Nami makes an astonishing discovery about the origins of Upper Yard.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Light the fire of shandora! Wyper, the warrior!

programme.title: While the Shandorians continue their battle for control of Upper Yard, the Straw Hats celebrate their happy reunion by swapping stories over a campfire and feasting on barbequed Skyshark!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Jaya, city of gold in the sky! Head for god's shrine!

programme.title: Lakis pursuit of precious Vearth causes one of her Shandorian comrades to be injured during the battle with Ohm. As night falls on Upper Yard, the Straw Hats dream of gold while dancing with wolves!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Festival on the night before gold-hunting! Feelings for vearth!

programme.title: The electrifying deity of Skypiea, God Eneru, grants his priests unlimited power in their hunt for the Straw Hats. Usopp has a plan to get the mysteriously-repaired Going Merry back in the water, but it involves using Chopper as bait!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter god eneru!! Farewell to the survivors!

programme.title: The Straw Hats scatter when their search for gold uncovers a giant python, and Gan Fall reveals the tragic story of Jayas arrival in the sky. Meanwhile, Wyper readies the Shandorians for a raid on Enerus shrine!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A giant snake bares its fangs! The survival game begins!

programme.title: As the heartless god of Upper Yard eagerly anticipates the dawning of Sky Warefare, the Shandorian forces are savagely snared by the Ordeal of String, and Luffy wanders into the fight of his life!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The deadly reject! War demon wyper's resolve!

programme.title: Zoro rushes to perfect a deadly technique known as the Flying Blade Attack. The move proves difficult to master, but it could be the key to the swordsman surviving a battle with the Shandorian warrior, Braham.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fierce midair battle! Pirate zoro vs. Warrior braham!

programme.title: Sanji and Usopp are driven to their knees by the electrifying presence of god, Luffy is nearly incinerated by Wypers Burn Bazooka, and Nami joins Gan Fall in a fight against two killer clones!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The roaring burn bazooka! Luffy vs. War demon wyper!

programme.title: Chopper unleashes the fury of his Rumble Ball during a sticky slugfest with a swap cloud spewing priest of Upper Yard. Can the little reindeer discover his opponents lone weakness before its too late?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ordeal of the swamp! Chopper vs. Sky punk gedatsu!

programme.title: Nami and the Knight of the Sky team up to obliterate two bumbling, balloon-shaped bad guys, and God Eneru relies on his astounding invincibility to torment a noble Shandorian warrior.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unbeatable powers! Eneru's true form is revealed!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster, Al Capone left behind five tiles that reveal the location of his massive gold hoard when put together. Out of the five tiles, Lupin and Fujiko have three in their possession.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata concocts an extravagant plan to finally capture Lupin by luring him in with a fake meteor made from 6 tons of pure gold. Low and behold, his plan backfires and Lupin and his gang make off with the meteor.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin sneaks into an old castle to steal a collection of priceless angel paintings, owned by the late Malcolm Hurst. Inside the castle, Lupin meets a mysterious girl named Flora, who knows the whereabouts of the angel paintings.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are out at sea attempting to retrieve the gold inside a sunken pirate ship. However, a female pirate gang interrupts their retrieval mission and both parties leave empty-handed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in South Africa to receive a nautical chart from a retired Nazi that shows the location of a sunken Nazi treasure. However, two young German soldiers interrupt the exchange and a skirmish ensues.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in the small city of San Pico in Central America. However, the city was in the midst of a war between the Government Forces and the Guerilla Army. Leading the Guerilla Army is Jigen's old army pal, Giranco.
programme.sub-title: Here Comes Lupin in a Tank

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Unsurprisingly, Fujiko had once betrayed her heist partner Garb, known as the Grim Reaper, and left him for dead. Garb, who has seemingly returned from the dead, is determined to kill Fujiko and has an uncanny ability to dodge bullets with ease.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious cult that idolizes a solid gold Virgin Mary statue abducts Fujiko and they're planning to burn her at the stake as a witch. However, her kidnapper and the cult leader look vaguely familiar to Lupin. Have they crossed paths before?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has a horrible case of athlete's foot and visits Dr. Budweiser, who is also a cloning expert, for treatment. The doctor takes a sample of Lupin's skin under the guise of treating his Athlete's foot, but the doctor has another plan up his sleeve.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious message appears in the newspaper and Lupin takes it as a sign from this late grandfather, Lupin I, to reclaim his diamond keepsake.
programme.sub-title: A Treasure That Smells Like a Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal the Dracula Heart Ruby from a mysterious woman known as Mother. The Dracula Heart Ruby is known to bleed once every century and whoever drinks its blood maintains their youth for another 100 years.
programme.sub-title: The Ruby Sheds Tears of Blood

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin steals a painting of Lupin I's beloved from Baltan Gallery in Paris. However, the painting turns out to be a forgery and Lupin has a clue as to who is painting the forgeries. With his daughter Sophie held hostage.
programme.sub-title: The Prisoner Inside the Baltan Manor

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko attend a lavish party full of wealthy women in order to steal their jewelry. However, the castle tower where the party was being held turns out to be a rocket ship. The hijacked rocket transports the party and guests to a small island.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mrs. Alda, a wealthy heiress is kidnapped and Lupin shows up to claim the ransom money. However, the real mastermind behind the kidnapping is Mrs. Alda herself. After she gets the ransom money, she erases Lupin's memory and frames him for the crime.
programme.sub-title: Care to Play a Kidnapping Game?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin learns he needs a pure-hearted girl to find an ancient Persian treasure and his computer chooses a girl named Lori. After getting some hands-on training from Jigen and Goemon, the two are headed to Jordan to find the treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Golden Apple, known as "Eve's Apple" is being transported to New York City on board a luxury cruise ship and Inspector Zenigata has a gut feeling Lupin is after it. Inspector Zenigata's hunch is on the mark as Lupin and Jigen are onboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: A Golden Apple Has Its Poison

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon when Fujiko promises to marry him if he steals the ICPO's gold for her. Lupin pulls off the heist right under Inspector Zenigata's nose, but the two soon find themselves locked up in jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: It's the Mafia Boss' birthday party and everyone is gambling away. Lupin's next target is the casino's safe. While attending the party, Lupin meets a girl named Jenny, who is willing to help him pull off the heist to sell her name.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin breaks out a man named Parker from a Mexican prison in order to steal the treasure Parker had hidden away somewhere.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin, who was once duped by Mamushidayu into stealing diamonds, decides its payback time. Will Lupin get his revenge and finally get his share of diamonds after all?
programme.sub-title: The Man Who Erased His Past

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: An ancient burial mound has been discovered and etched on its walls are ancient mythical creatures with jewel-encrusted eyes. Lupin makes off with the blue dragon's crystal eye and kidnaps the archeologist in charge.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang break into a vault full of uncut diamonds. However, the diamonds suddenly catch on fire, and guess who is being blamed for it!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Swiss Bank's Beirut branch is a mobile branch. Will Lupin manage to pull off the heist of this impenetrable bank and get out safely with Inspector Zenigata on his tail?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are after Taniyama's treasure from an ancient Chinese dynasty. Realizing that Lupin is after his treasure, Taniyama hires a lone assassin named Seiryuu to counter Goemon.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: How could Lupin and his gang refuse when a church priest asks them to retrieve the Dove's Eggs, the church's jewels, for the sake of Spoonland's children?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in New York City to steal a pinball machine made of solid gold. Lupin, Jigen, and Fujiko board a casino cruise ship and discover that they'll need Goemon's Zantetsuken sword to pull off the heist.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were pursuing Flight 107 when Soviet Union planes suddenly shoot it down for wandering into its territory inadvertently.
programme.sub-title: Code Name is The Star of Alaska

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A ring called the Star of Alaska holds a single wheat seed inside it. The seed is a new species of wheat that can grow in minus 40 degrees and the CIA and KGB are determined to get their hands on it.
programme.sub-title: The Star of Alaska Is a Ticket to Hell

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel: Witch Hunters, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for a twisted take on the classic tale as Hansel and Gretel have turned pro, coping with the trauma of their childhood captivity by slaying witches for hire.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: Pompeii, (2014, Super Swashbucklers)
programme.desc: Set in 79 A.D., POMPEII tells the epic story of Milo, a slave turned invincible gladiator who finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, Cassia, the beautiful daughter of a wealthy merchant.

programme.title: The Fifth Element, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Milla Jovovich, and Gary Oldman star in acclaimed director Luc Besson's outrageous sci-fi adventure, an extravagantly styled tale of good against evil set in an unbelievable twenty-third century world.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: Barbarosa, (1982, Drama)
programme.desc: A young cowboy hooks up with a legendary outlaw, and before long both are on the run from the law.

programme.title: Whirlwind, (1951, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry arrives in Red Bluff to work on the investigation of mail robberies. U.S. Bonds are stolen, and Smiley finds burned fragments of them. A henchman confesses who the guilty party is.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Drama)

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: Num futuro em que um experimento fracassado matou quase todas as pessoas, um novo sistema de classes emerge.

programme.title: Fuga
programme.desc: Dez anos depois que a peste negra devastou seu pais, uma pobre familia viaja em busca de melhores condicoes de vida. Em uma passagem deserta nas montanhas, eles sao atacados por uma gangue de crueis fora-da-lei, que so poupa Signe, uma garota de 19 anos.

programme.title: Entre Inimigos
programme.desc: No inicio da II Guerra Mundial, um confronto hostil nos ceus da arida floresta norueguesa deixa duas aeronaves uma britanica e uma alema caidas em uma regiao remota e isolada. Por uma estranha coincidencia os grupos procuram abrigo na mesma cabana. Eles tem que lutar para sobreviver ao brutal inverno, para poder voltar a guerra

programme.title: Mergulho Profundo
programme.desc: No inicio dos anos 80, quando houve o boom de petroleo na Noruega, depositos enormes foram descobertos no Mar do Norte. As autoridades visavam trazer o oleo para terra atraves de um gasoduto a 500 metros de profundidade. Eles contratam um mergulhador profissional, que tem a disciplina, forca e coragem necessaria para assumir essa perigosa missao.

programme.title: Dupla Explosiva: Ecks vs. Sever
programme.desc: O agente do FBI Jonathan Ecks percebe que deve se juntar ao seu inimigo de longa data, o Agente Sever, um agente desonesto da DIA com quem est em combate mortal, a fim de derrotar um inimigo comum que desenvolveu um "microdispositivo" que pode ser injetado em vtimas para mat-las vontade.

programme.title: O Anel do Rei - A ltima Batalha
programme.desc: Baseado em uma lenda do seculo 13 e estrelado por Edwin Endre (da serie Vikings) e James Bloor (Dunkirk), o filme conta uma historia repleta de acao epica de um jovem rei que deve aceitar sua responsabilidade e ganhar a confianca do seu povo, a fim de defender a sua liberdade contra as cruzadas violentas.

programme.title: Plano de Fuga
programme.desc: Plano de Fuga traz Mel Gibson no papel de um criminoso americano que ultrapassa a fronteira entre Estados Unidos e Mxico durante a fuga de um roubo a banco. Ele acaba preso pelas autoridades mexicanas e enviado para um presdio lotado de bandidos de alta periculosidade. No bastasse essa experincia bizarra, ele acaba se envolvendo com uma famlia local e se metendo numa grande enrascada em terras estrangeiras porque a bandidagem agora quer a pele dele. Para sobreviver na priso, ele ter que aceitar a ajuda de um garoto de apenas 9 anos (Kevin Hernandez), com quem ir planejar sua fuga.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: Poon Shing-Fung (Andy Lau) um policial especialista em desarmar bombas. No meio de uma ao, uma exploso ocorre e ele acaba entrando em coma, alm de perder a memria. Ao acordar, Poon recebe a informao de est sendo investigado, acusado de fazer parte do atentado que na verdade, ele estava trabalhando para tentar impedir. Enquanto isso, um verdadeiro terrorista especialista em explosivos, cuja gangue foi derrubada, busca vingana. Ele ameaa explodir um tnel de Hong Kong com centenas de refns. O policial dever tentar det-lo novamente.

programme.title: Entre Inimigos
programme.desc: No inicio da II Guerra Mundial, um confronto hostil nos ceus da arida floresta norueguesa deixa duas aeronaves uma britanica e uma alema caidas em uma regiao remota e isolada. programme.title: Em Busca da Carta Proibida
programme.desc: Storm Voeten, filho do impressor Klaas Voeten, torna-se alvo de uma caada da Inquisio. Ajudado por Marieke, uma garota misteriosa que vive nos esgotos subterrneos da Anturpia, Storm est em uma corrida contra o tempo para salvar seu pai da morte.

programme.title: O Mistrio da F
programme.desc: Uma pequena cidade do interior enfrenta os desafios aps adolescentes sofrerem overdose acidental

programme.title: Nada para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educao rgida, eles tambm desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, professor e est apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, h uma coisa que sempre os manter juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: Em Busca Do Castelo Dourado
programme.desc: Quando o rei e a rainha so envenenados, os irmos Per e Pal so presos suspeitos do crime. O caula da famlia, Espen Ash Lad e a princesa Kristin embarcam em uma perigosa jornada em busca do lendrio castelo Soria Moria e da fonte da gua da Vida - a nica coisa que pode curar os pais de Kristin e salvar o reino.

programme.title: A Menina e o Leo
programme.desc: Mia se muda para a frica do Sul com sua famlia para administrar uma fazenda de lees e desenvolve um vnculo especial com Charlie, um filhote de leo branco. As coisas mudam quando ela descobre o segredo de seu pai. Desolada com a possibilidade de Charlie estar em perigo, Mia decide fugir. Os dois partem em uma aventura pica em busca de outra terra onde Charlie possa viver seguro e livre

programme.title: O Caador e o Livro Mgico
programme.desc: Um lendrio caador de demnios, interpretado por Jackie Chan, investiga o desaparecimento de jovens garotas de um vilarejo. Quando descobre que foras malignas esto sequestrando as meninas para se banquetearem com suas almas, ele parte para salvar a humanidade

programme.title: O Livro do Amor
programme.desc: Aps a morte de sua esposa grvida, Henry encontra-se perdido em uma vida centrada no trabalho.

programme.title: O Mistrio da F
programme.desc: Uma pequena cidade do interior enfrenta os desafios aps adolescentes sofrerem overdose acidental

programme.title: Sem Controle
programme.desc: A vida de um jovem vira de cabea para baixo quando seus sonhos violentos comeam a se confundir com a realidade.

programme.title: A Possesso de Mary
programme.desc: David (Gary Oldman) um capito de colarinho azul que luta para melhorar a vida de sua famlia. Estranhamente atrado por um navio abandonado que est em leilo, David impulsivamente compra o barco, acreditando que ser o bilhete de sua famlia para a felicidade e a prosperidade. Mas logo depois que eles embarcam em sua jornada inaugural, eventos estranhos e assustadores comeam a aterrorizar David e sua famlia, fazendo com que se voltem um contra o outro e duvidem de sua prpria sanidade.

programme.title: Aprisionados
programme.desc: Realizado em uma delegacia de polcia remota, um estranho misterioso toma conta das mentes e das almas de todos dentro.

programme.title: Baile de Formatura
programme.desc: Enquanto um grupo de adolescentes se prepara para o baile de formatura, eles no sabem que um assassino est em busca de vingana. Uma noite de celebrao rapidamente se transforma em um terrvel banho de sangue... e todos so suspeitos.

programme.title: A Colnia
programme.desc: Na nova era glacial, um grupo de sobreviventes luta para proteger a humanidade de uma ameaa muito mais selvagem do que a natureza.

programme.title: Acima de Qualquer Suspeita
programme.desc: C.J. Nichols (Jesse Metcalfe) um jornalista investigativo disposto a denunciar o famoso promotor Mark Hunter (Michael Douglas), franco candidato a governador, por manipular provas em seus processos. Para isso, decide expor os perigos da evidncia circunstancial, que pode levar um inocente a ser condenado, vai preso por um assassinato que no cometeu, mas seu plano comea a dar errado e a sua priso pode ser definitiva.

programme.title: A Maldio do Castelo Margam
programme.desc: Uma equipe de parapsiclogos americanos viaja ao Pas de Gales para realizar um estudo no Castelo de Margam, um dos edifcios mais assombrados do Reino Unido.

programme.title: Trauma
programme.desc: Aps sofrer um grave acidente de carro, April desperta sem lembrar do que aconteceu.

programme.title: Uma Histria de Amor e Fria
programme.desc: Gira em torno do amor entre um heri imortal e Janana, a mulher por quem ele est apaixonado h 600 anos, atravs da colonizao, escravido, domnio militar e o futuro do Brasil em 2096, em meio s guerras da gua.

programme.title: Aprisionados
programme.desc: Realizado em uma delegacia de polcia remota, um estranho misterioso toma conta das mentes e das almas de todos dentro.

programme.title: Baile de Formatura

programme.title: A Colnia
programme.desc: Na nova era glacial, um grupo de sobreviventes luta para proteger a humanidade de uma ameaa muito mais selvagem do que a natureza.

programme.title: Redeno
programme.desc: Histria do ex-motoqueiro e traficante Sam Childers, que tornou-se um grande lutador em defesa das crianas do Sudo, obrigadas a virar soldados muito antes de se tornarem homens. O sujeito se dedica com paixo s crianas e acaba deixando um pouco de lado sua vida nos Estados Unidos, onde tem esposa e filha. Conhecido como "pastor da metralhadora", ele no tem problema em pegar em armas para defender o que pensa.

programme.title: Refns do Mal
programme.desc: Coisas sinistras comeam a acontecer com os sequestradores que esto mantendo um menino para resgate em uma cabana remota.

programme.title: Hacker: Todo Crime Tem Um Incio
programme.desc: Um jovem imigrante chega ao Canad e se envolve com uma organizao criminosa online chamada Darkweb.

programme.title: Roubo a Mfia
programme.desc: Um casal especializado em roubar da mfia comea um trabalho to grande que os torna alvos tanto da mfia quanto do FBI.

programme.title: A ltima Fronteira
programme.desc: Miguel, um mdico espanhol, coloca-se em perigo para prestar tratamento mdico s vtimas de revoltas militares. Wren porta-voz de uma organizao que financia assistncia mdica a naes empobrecidas em todo o mundo. Eles se conhecem na Libria, onde Wren fica imediatamente impressionado com a abnegao, a habilidade mdica e o charme de Miguel. Ambos iniciam um romance trrido, que devem aprender a combinar com seu importante trabalho.

programme.title: Risco Imediato
programme.desc: Um jovem casal de americanos que vive em Londres tem uma grande divida por justa causa. Uma manh eles encontram que o inquilino do apartamento de baixo morre e deixa 200.000 em dinheiro. Tudo o que eles tm a fazer pegar o dinheiro e todos os seus problemas seriam resolvidos. Ento eles fazem, e desde ahi coisas muito ruins comeam a acontecer para eles.

programme.title: Efeito Domin
programme.desc: Em setembro de 1971 foi construdo um tnel para dentro da caixa-forte de um banco na Baker Street, em Londres. De l foram roubados diversos cofres de dinheiro e jias, no valor de milhes de libras.

programme.title: Refns do Mal

programme.title: Encontro Selvagem
programme.desc: Les Moore um homem de negcios que um ano atrs teve um encontro inesperado aps alguns drinks em Albuquerque, Novo Mxico. Desde ento o fato fica revirando em sua cabea, at que ele decide voltar ao local junto com Natalie Hamilton, sua colega de trabalho, para desvendar o que realmente aconteceu naquela noite.

programme.title: Ningum Brinca com Jesus Quintana
programme.desc: Um trio de amigos desajustados vive de forma espontnea e irreverente. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento - S2E55
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro - S2E56
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno - S2E57
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido - S2E58
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimenso. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo - S2E59
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia - S2E60
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato - S2E61
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe! - S2E62
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis - S2E63
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto - S2E64
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido - S2E65
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas - S2E66
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden - S2E67
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar - S2E68
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero - S2E69
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia - S2E70
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo - S2E71
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima - S2E72
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki - S2E73
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado - S2E74
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge - S2E75
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo - S2E76
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.
